definitions.text: pass into or through, often by overcoming resistance
become clear or enter one's consciousness or emotions
examples: It dawned on him that she had betrayed him

definitions.text: enter a group or organization in order to spy on the members
examples: The student organization was infiltrated by a traitor

definitions.text: make one's way deeper into or through
examples: The hikers did not manage to penetrate the dense forest

definitions.text: insert the penis into the vagina or anus of
examples: Did the molester penetrate the child?
An atmosphere of distrust has permeated this administration
His campaign was riddled with accusations and personal attacks
